reviews.text: A very homely feeling at this Pension. This pension is not close to the lake, but most of the rooms have a clear lake view. The balcony is large and the rooms quite clean. The family running this pension was very nice and the breakfast provided by them had a homely touch. The garden outside well maintained and the lake is 8 mins walk from the pension. Would highly recommend this place as it is worth the money. (it is a bit cheaper than those closer to the lake).
reviews.title: Loved Haus Brigitte
